a nested list with no whitespace:

  • item a
  • item b
    • item bb
    • item bc

a nested list with lots of whitespace:

  • item wa
  • item wb
    • item wbb
    • item wbc
  • 1 Basic concepts
  • 2 History of the idea
  • 3 Intelligence explosion

  • I want to have a party at my house!

  • I don't want to cleanup after the party!

  • li 1, p 1

    li 1, p 2

  • li 2, p 1

  1. one
    1. one one
    2. one two
  2. two
    1. two one
      1. two one one
      2. two one two
    2. two two
  3. three

a nested list between adjacent list items

  • alpha
  • bravo
    • bravo alpha
    • bravo bravo
      • bravo bravo alpha
  • charlie
  • delta
  • item followed with a text
